name: Global Lives Project
copy: I was brought in to provide strategy for their 2013 fundraising campaign. Soon thereafter, I connected all their outgoing communications with Google Analytics. I then sent out weekly reports which served to help focus their efforts based on conversion rates. They raised 119% of their goal.
From the Executive Director: "Michael arrived just at the right time and jumped into a high-pressure project with tight deadlines and figured out exactly where he could help. "
